Articles.Content:
Steam automatically updates your installation of KSP, shouldn't have to do anything.

Game library > right-click any game > Properties > Updates tab

Check the options under "automatic updates"

Steam automatically updates your installation of KSP, shouldn't have to do anything.

Game library > right-click any game > Properties > Updates tab

Check the options under "automatic updates"

Doesn't work. I put it's update priority at the top, yet when i launch it, it says that it is still 1.0.2.
Try fully closing steamd own and restarting, or try verifying the cache of ksp
